en-US.title: Centretown Community Health Centre
en-US.description: The Centretown Community Health Centre offers comprehensive healthcare services with a focus on supporting caring, inclusive, and connected communities. With a variety of programs and services tailored to diverse groups, including the 2SLGBTQIA+ community, it helps serve the transmasculine, non-binary, and transfeminine members of the transgender community, addressing their specific physical health, mental health and addiction needs.

address: 420 Cooper St, Ottawa, ON K2P 2N6, Canada
